Room.Name: Secret Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a narrow hallway leading to the Cremetorium.
Room.LongDescription: Although not really a 'secret' hallway, most people visiting the Mausoleum never give it a second glance. The east hallway leads to the Crematorium. The ashes are then returned to either the Mausoleum or placed in the Crypt.
